targets.expr: ((0.001 * sum(rate(app_http_requests_total{team=~"$team", environment=~"$environment"}[30d])) by (team) * 2592000) - sum(increase(app_http_requests_total{status=~"5..", team=~"$team", environment=~"$environment"}[30d])) by (team)) / (0.001 * sum(rate(app_http_requests_total{team=~"$team", environment=~"$environment"}[30d])) by (team) * 2592000) * 100
